title: Glowbug Alert Notice
description: Information about a Glowbug trigger.  All fields optional; omitted if not available or not applicable.

allOf.description: event_id=[ 'BUGyymmdd.fff', seqnum ], where fff is in milidays with trailing zeros. id_source=GLOWBUG for both.
rate_duration is the integration time (a.k.a. trigger time scale), over which the rate_snr was measured.

detector_statuses.description: Detector statuses at trigger time. Detectors: 0..11 - CsI; 12, 13 - CLLB; 14 - SSA.
